property.name: featureName
property.value: Successfully add items to basket and remove an item from basket

testcase.name: Successfully_add_items_to_basket_and_remove_an_item_from_basket.Login_as_a_standard_user_user_on_saucedemo_and_add_items_to_basket
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on saucedemo login page✅ When I login with 'standard_user' and 'secret_sauce'✅ When I am on 'Products' page I Sort the products by Price from drop down high to low✅ And I Add the two cheapest products to the basket✅ And I Open the basket✅ And I Remove the cheapest product from the basket✅ Then cheapest product should be removed successfully✅ And I click on Checkout and I need to see 'Checkout: Your Information' text on header

testcase.name: Successfully_add_items_to_basket_and_remove_an_item_from_basket.Error_Message_should_be_displayed_when_I_login_with_Sceniro
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on saucedemo login page✅ When I login with 'someuser' and 'nopassword'✅ Then I should see a flash message saying 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service'

testcase.name: Successfully_add_items_to_basket_and_remove_an_item_from_basket.Error_Message_should_be_displayed_when_I_login_with_Sceniro
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on saucedemo login page✅ When I login with '' and ''✅ Then I should see a flash message saying 'Epic sadface: Username is required'

testcase.name: Successfully_add_items_to_basket_and_remove_an_item_from_basket.Error_Message_should_be_displayed_when_I_login_with_Sceniro
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on saucedemo login page✅ When I login with 'standard_user' and ''✅ Then I should see a flash message saying 'Epic sadface: Password is required'
